topic: Mendix SDK Community Resources & Expert Sources
description: Comprehensive collection of community-discovered Mendix SDK resources, npm packages, GitHub repositories, archived Medium articles, and expert contacts for deeper SDK research and examples.
research_notes: Deep research conducted to find 10-30+ examples per source category. Archive.ph discovered as workaround for 404'd Medium articles.

npm_sdk_packages.name: @sefranke/sf-mendix-sdk-helper
npm_sdk_packages.description: Makes Mendix SDK development easier. Helper functions for creating microflow parameters, translations, text templates, sequence flows.
npm_sdk_packages.author: sefranke
npm_sdk_packages.value: VERY HIGH - Contains working patterns for entity creation, microflow activities, loops, queued calls
key_features: createAttribute() - Create entity attributes with types
createForEachLoop() - Loop activities with proper IterableList
getLocationsForModule() - Track x,y coordinates in flows

release_notes_patterns.v1.7.0: Fixed createForEachLoop with list variable name and variable name parameters
release_notes_patterns.v1.5.0: Added location tracking: getLocationsForModule(), getDomainModelLocation(), getFlowLocation()

npm_sdk_packages.name: mxdocgen
npm_sdk_packages.description: Documentation generation tool using Mendix Model SDK. Mimics Studio Pro documentation capabilities with greater flexibility.
npm_sdk_packages.author: Kevin Vlaanderen
npm_sdk_packages.value: HIGH - Shows model traversal, module filtering, template generation
npm_sdk_packages.usage_pattern: mxdocgen generate --username USER --apikey KEY --projectid ID --modules '.*' --outputdir output

npm_sdk_packages.name: mfautolayout
npm_sdk_packages.description: Microflow auto-layout tool using Dagre library. Rearranges microflow components automatically.
npm_sdk_packages.author: vietduc1441
npm_sdk_packages.value: MEDIUM - Shows microflow traversal and coordinate manipulation
key_features: Dagre library integration for graph layout
npm_sdk_packages.config_example: var project = { username: 'xxx', apikey: 'KEY', projectId: 'ID', projectName: 'NAME', revNo: -1, branchName: null };

npm_sdk_packages.name: openmdx
npm_sdk_packages.description: Export Mendix Model to open source alternatives. Explores Mendix and Platform SDK possibilities.
npm_sdk_packages.author: mango-ict (MangoICT)

npm_sdk_packages.name: @clevr/mendixplatformsdk
npm_sdk_packages.description: Mendix Platform SDK fork by CLEVR (consulting company)

npm_sdk_packages.name: @gajduk/mendixplatformsdk
npm_sdk_packages.description: Platform SDK fork by Gajduk Andrej (performance expert)
npm_sdk_packages.author: Gajduk Andrej

npm_sdk_packages.name: @types/mendixmodelsdk
npm_sdk_packages.description: TypeScript definitions stub for Mendix Model SDK

github_repositories.name: MendixModelSDKDemo
github_repositories.description: SDK demo for extracting module information and generating JSON schemas from mendixmodelsdk types
github_repositories.value: VERY HIGH - Shows advanced SDK introspection and schema extraction
key_insights: Generates JSON Schema for each module
Handles property types: PrimitiveProperty, ByNameReferenceProperty, PartListProperty, PartProperty
Extracts versionInfo including deleted flags and property changes
Multi-phase processing: Extract → Transform → Generate Schema

property_types_discovered.ByNameReferenceProperty: References to other elements by name

github_repositories.name: MxDocGen
github_repositories.description: Documentation generation using Model SDK with template support

github_repositories.name: openmdx
github_repositories.description: Mendix model export to open source alternatives

archived_medium_articles.title: How to work with Variables in Java actions
archived_medium_articles.author: Ryan Mocke
archived_medium_articles.value: HIGH - Shows Java proxy usage, getMendixObject(), entity creation in Java

archived_medium_articles.title: The new way to call Mendix microflows from Java actions
archived_medium_articles.author: Robert Price

archived_medium_articles.title: How to Make Apps Multithreaded in Mendix 9
archived_medium_articles.author: Ryan Mocke
archived_medium_articles.value: MEDIUM - Task Queue, background execution patterns

archived_medium_articles.title: How to React to the new way Mendix widgets are built
archived_medium_articles.author: Rob Duits

archived_medium_articles.title: How to develop with best practices
archived_medium_articles.author: Ryan Mocke
topics: Microflow naming conventions (ACT_, DS_, SUB_, VAL_, OCH_, BCO_, ACO_)

archived_medium_articles.title: Performance modeling in Mendix — Indexes
archived_medium_articles.author: Martin Leppen
key_insights: Index creates separate table with selected attributes + primary key
Order of index attributes must match XPath constraint order
Don't index every attribute - only high-variance ones
Indexes impact deployment sync time on large tables

archived_medium_articles.title: Performance modeling in Mendix — Batch processing
archived_medium_articles.author: Martin Leppen

archived_medium_articles.title: Mastering Mendix Maps: Unlocking Lightning-Fast Performance
archived_medium_articles.author: Marius van der Knaap

archived_medium_articles.title: Add Google SSO to your Mendix app using the OIDC module
archived_medium_articles.author: Ryan Mocke

archived_medium_articles.title: How to send styled HTML emails using email module
archived_medium_articles.author: Ryan Mocke

archived_medium_articles.title: Making a difference with Mendix (Diff module)
archived_medium_articles.author: Robert Price

archived_medium_articles.title: Building a debugging keyboard for Mendix Studio Pro
archived_medium_articles.author: Robert Price

archived_medium_articles.title: Module rolls? A difficult decision — Mendix and Me
archived_medium_articles.author: Andreas Blaesius

mendix_experts.name: Rob Duits
mendix_experts.role: Low-code front-end developer, Managing consultant at Incentro

sdk_helper_patterns.problem: Need to track x,y coordinates when placing elements in domain model or microflows
sdk_helper_patterns.example_code: const locFlow = sh.getFlowLocation('MyFirstModule'); locFlow.x += 200; createActivity({x: locFlow.x, y: locFlow.y});

methods: createQueuedMicroflowCall(qualifiedMicroflowName, mfParams, queueSettings, relativeMiddlePoint, microflow?, size?, caption?)

key_points: Import proxy class generated by Mendix
Return getMendixObject() for Mendix object return types

research_sources.result: Mendix Medium articles NOT archived there
research_sources.note: Archive.org does not have Mendix Medium SDK articles
